message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I believe it has great potential, but I am looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider selling it for $18000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand you're looking for a lower price, $18000 is still a bit below what I'm hoping for.  I'm willing to come down to $19000. This is a fair price considering the value this product offers. What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still seeking a price closer to my budget. Could we agree on $17000 for the product?
Bob, I understand you have a budget to stick to.  I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. How about $18500?  I really believe you'll get a lot of value out of this product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value I believe the product will provide, I would like to propose $17500 as the price.
